Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that are immediately followed by Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER relative to all process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER compared to Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that eventually lead back to a successful Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER out of all rejection activities (including Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR, Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER, Declaration REJECTED by MISSING)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of the path Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER → Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR versus Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER appears more than once in the same trace
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER with case:Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that occur without a preceding Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Ratio of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of variants starting with Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that end in Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in traces that include Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE prior to submission
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurring in domestic declaration reimbursement processes (inferred from absence of pre-approval steps other than PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that are followed within the same trace by another Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of total occurrences of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to total number of activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that appear in traces also containing Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of the full rework loop: Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER → Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurring in 2018 versus 2017
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER performed per month to detect seasonal patterns
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities
